function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of increased psychosocial needs due to the Covid-19 pandemic","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and social functioning","Mitigation":"Integration of psychosocial support into general pandemic health care","Technologies":"Telehealth, online counseling platforms","People":"Patients, health care providers, and the public","Owner":"Health care providers"}]}
